statements: DELETE FROM TradeHistory WHERE to_team = 'Team A' AND trade_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM salaries WHERE player_id = 10 AND year = 2020;
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE player_id = 123 AND team_id = 456;
DELETE FROM salaries WHERE year = 2022 AND salary_amount > 100000;

DELETE FROM SalaryHistory WHERE player_id = 1001 AND effective_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TradeHistory WHERE from_team_id = 101 AND trade_date > '2021-10-01';
